name: One in a Million (Joshua Ásberg, Pontus Joneström, Martin Halldin)
name_original: One in a Million (Joshua Ásberg, Pontus Joneström, Martin Halldin)
description:
One In A Million is a short narrative experience about chance.

A game created by
Joshua Ásberg
Martin Halldin
Pontus Joneström

Assets used
Piano by jeremy, via Poly Pizza
Clover by Poly by Google, via Poly Pizza
8 Ball by Jarlan Perez, via Poly Pizza

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022
